155322222222222222222222221.content:
Cream was in the backyard, picking flowers and having fun as usual in the afternoon. In the back of their house, there was a fairly sized flower field and just not too far behind that was a huge thick forest. Cream was still picking up flowers and decided to pick some near the wooded area.

Strangely enough, as she approached the thick woods, her long sensitive ears picked up a feint sound emitting from deep within the woods. Vanilla always warned her daughter not to tread into the forest because of how dangerous it was, and true enough the forest was dark with little to no sunlight and looked like it was easy to get lost in. Cream usually obeys what her mom tells her to do, but her childlike curiosity grew to see where that sound was coming from in the woods. She looked back to the house, still a bit unsure to venture in knowing all to well that her mom would be mad and worried about her, and then decided and thought to herself, 'I'm sure it'll be fine if I could go for a little while to check out the sound. I just need to get back before it gets dark.'

Cream went off into the woods, following the strange sound. As she delve deeper into the forest, the sound became louder and a bit clearer. The sound was now seemed to be recognized as some kind of jovial, cheery music. It was now going late into the afternoon and the sun was going down as she was now going farther from the house. However, her mind was too focused on finding out the source of the music. After about half an hour, she then started to see some lights dancing in the distance. She was now close to whatever making the music.

When she arrived to sight of the lights, she was in total shock on what she came across. In a huge clearing, there was a big and bright carnival with many of the usual attractions visible when she peered through the entrance such as a ferris wheel, roller coasters, game booths, and etc. Cream was fascinated by it all. However, something was totally off at the start. She realized that there were no one handling the ticket booths at the entrance. In fact, it looked completely empty with no signs of other customers or staff, so how could it be running? Cream's curiosity got the better of her and started to go in and take a look around, hopefully she would be able to find some signs of life within. Yet she could at least be able to have fun as well.

Which attraction does she head to first?

1553222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Just a few weeks before Halloween, the young rabbit was excited and giddy as she, her chao, and her mom traveled down a festive street of ghosts, pumpkins and other fall and Halloween in Station Square to go to the new seasonal store, Ghoulish Garbs.

It wasn't long until they stopped in front of the store with its pumpkin shaped building and witch hat rooftop. Stepping inside and after greeting the female 'witch' porcupine, they were greeted by a large array of costumes that hung on round steel racks and folded on shelves, ranging from the scary to non-scary, from banshees to superheroes to vampires.

"Cream, dearie, do you know what kind of costume you want?" Vanilla said to the child.

Cream thought deeply about it for a moment and finally decided on a costume that was...

1553222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Maternal Cream

1553222222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Cream was wandering around with a annoyed look on her face because she hasn't found a good gift for her mother yet and Mother's Day was just around the corner. Cream said, "Oh boy oh boy what do I get mother? It has to be something old this year but I can't find anything worth it, hmm?" Cream found herself at the front door to an antique store. Cream said, "Perfect! An antique store. This should be a good place to get something vintage." Cream said to the owner of the shop, "Hello do you have anything very old because I'm trying to get something for my mother for Mother's Day." The owner said, "I have just the thing for you." The owner pulls out some sort of idol that is in the shape of a pregnant woman with a rather large belly and after thinking for a bit Cream said, "That's just what I needed! Here you go some cash." The owner thanked Cream for the money and said goodbye to her. Cream was walking back home looking at the idol and said, "Huh what's up with the way this idol looks? Don't think I've seen anything look like this before. Hmm?" Cream noticed it started glowing a little. Cream decided to sit at a picnic table so she could look at it without fear of breaking it. The moment she set it down a pink mist started emanating from the idol. Cream was shocked and was going to run when the mist suddenly entered her through her mouth. Cream was forced to swallow the mist entirely. After doing so Cream was dazed. A voice started talking to her which brought her to her senses and it said, "Finally! I found a host. Oh I'm sorry should introduce myself. Names Himo, a goddess of fertility. Hmm? You don't seem to be old enough to utilize my powers yet. No matter I can simply accelerate your age to where you can. Question is do you want to? I understand if you don't want to."
1553222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Yes

1553222222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Water park Puberty - Vanilla and Cream go to a water park where certain things happen to age the bunny girl
1553222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Water Park Puberty?

info.brief_description: A Cream the Rabbit AP Interactive Story
info.description:
Select a scenario where Cream ages herself and add what happens from there. There is no age limit.

Rules:

1. Anything goes except for scat and watersports and WG.
2. Sex is allowed. No gay/lesbianism and no killing off characters.
3. AR is allowed if you want to reset her age - age 6. You can regress her to baby or toddler, but not for too long since this is AP focused.
4. Any other Sonic char can join, but Cream's the main focus.
5. Have fun!

Sonic and chars rightfully belong to Sonic Team and Sega.
